name: citomni/http-skeleton
description: Baseline HTTP application skeleton for CitOmni. Kernel + HTTP mode; ready for webapps, APIs, intranet, or SaaS.

suggest.citomni/auth: Add user management (login/register/forgot password, profile, etc.).
suggest.citomni/infrastructure: Add lean infra services (db, log, txt, mail, etc.).
suggest.citomni/cli: Add CLI mode if you have a need for console commands alongside HTTP.
